question:
You ordered a book online for exam preparation. It has been some time since you ordered it and you still have not received your book.
Write a letter to the e-commerce company about this.

Describe your purchase order of the book
Explain the importance of the book
Say what you want the company to do for you.
text: I am writing this letter to express my dissatisfaction regarding the level of effectiveness in carrying out customer services. Please allow me to elaborate on my situation in more detail.

My name is Sara Khan, your customer with purchase order number 14578. I requested a set of books online from your company on the 20th of November, whereas the delivery of the parcel was expected within 5 days. Now, it has been one week since I made an online request but nothing has happened yet.

What is more, I am sitting in the IELTS exam at the end of this month, and these books are highly recommended by IELTS teachers. I have made various calls to your customer care department and they assure me that I would get my parcel in a short moment of time.

Finally, I would request you kindly expedite the delivery process, and make it in one to two days. Also, I understand from your website that in case of any unforeseen delay in the delivery process, I am eligible for a 50% discount on the purchase order.
Looking forward for a prompt response.

error_list.error_des: The preposition for after the verb Looking may be incorrect. Consider changing it to another preposition.
